alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 12:35PM PST until February 24 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches possible in the Northern Sacramento Valley, and along the western foothills of the Sacramento and Northern San Joaquin Valleys at or above 1000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley and western foothills of the Central and Southern Sacramento and Northern San Joaquin Valleys. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow accumulations along western foothills of the Central Valley.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley
